Nightstrike::

"NO AGAINST US IDIOT!!!!!" Roared Nighstrike while he avoided 
Synphony's shots "AGAINST MAXIMALS AND THEIR ALLIESS!!!!!!"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Symphony::
> 
>       Symphony lost some of his fear, which was being replaced with 
anger.
> 
>        "FINE THEN!" Symphony yelled back at Nightstrike.
> 
>         Symphony took his machine gun, and started shooting shots 
everywhere, spinning fastly in a circle.  A few shots hit Surgital, 
but didn't affect him.  Some shots went towards Alliance members, 
some towards Maxis, some towards the CF, some towards 
Symphony's "fellow" Decepticons, and some towards nowhere.  Symphony 
just closed his eyes, and kept going around, and around, and around, 
shooting, and shooting, and shooting, like he just didn't care, his 
face without expression.

>   From: airly2000@y...

>   Subject: Re: Slaughter and the Dark Avian
> 
> 
>   Nightstrike:
> 
>   Nightstrike shouted anger at Synphony "COME ON, YOU LITTLE-BOT... 
IF 
>   YOU WANT TO BE A WARRIOR YOU SHOULD SHOT AGAINST ALL YOUR 
ENEMIES!!!!"
> 
>   After that he fired two missiles agaisnt LAvatron
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
>   > OOC: That's okay, yah dont need to say sorry.
>   >

huge
